headline.main: NAZIS TURN WRATH ON ROOSEVELT TALK; Press Accuses President of Distorting Facts to Scare People of the Americas ATTACK OF 'NERVES' SEEN Executive Pictured as Fearing for Britain in Predicament Into Which He Led Her

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Dec. 31 -- President Roosevelt's Sunday broadcast finally drew fire along a wide front today.
abstract: by German official spokesman, Foreign Office and press
snippet: BERLIN, Dec. 31 -- President Roosevelt's Sunday broadcast finally drew fire along a wide front today....

byline.original: By GUIDO ENDERISWireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
